title: Sonification-Based STEAM Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science education knowledge, basic understanding of music theory, and awareness of STEAM education concepts
context.additional_context: Experimental Teaching Method Training Program for Pre-service Teachers: Emphasis on designing creative science-music integrated lessons using digital tools

learning_goals: Production of three or more science concept visualization audio files using sonification techniques.
Development of lesson plans integrating musical elements into a STEAM education design framework.
Design of sonification-based group activities to enhance learner collaboration.
Creative problem-solving through matching scientific data with musical parameters.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
